channel.title: Help With making a commands please and thank you
channel.description: Can Somone Tell me how or post a ::save command cuz lots of time girls can save there file and they keep logging in as boys and its they have to change over and over agn.. thx

item.title: Help With making a commands please and thank you
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

you should have a savechar boolean so just make the command like this

if (command.startsWith(“save”) && playerRights > -1) {
savechar();
savemoreinfo();
}

Read full topic
item.source: Help With making a commands please and thank you
